text: Di madagoaa dono duaahina go Absalom ne gidee a mee, ga heeu gi mee, “E hai behee? Amnon guu hai dana mee huaidu gi di goe? Dogu duaahina, goe hudee lodo huaidu ginai, idimaa goolua tagahaanau, di gulu damana la tamana hua e dahi. Goe hudee hagi anga gi tangada di hai dela ne hai.” Gei Tamar ga noho hua i baahi o Absalom, e lodo huaidu gei e manawa gee.
